q: editors at the News of the World knew that phone hacking was taking place. The accusations put Andy Coulson back into the spotlight. His resignation Friday came as little surprise to many political observers. Continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role.... When a spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on, Andy Coulson said in a statement, adding that he would leave the job in a few weeks. sources said David Cameron gathered a few colleagues together to show his continuing support for Andy Coulson . No 10 is expected to organise a proper leaving party, which will be attended by David Cameron . One source said: It was not a big leaving do. It was a quiet goodbye with the prime minister. There will be a night out with Andy Coulson when colleagues can give him a present. Andy Coulson - who said on 21 January that he had decided to resign because the wave of allegations about illegal phone hacking meant he was unable to do his job- will not receive severance pay,.

As an Idol judge, Steven Tyler admitted he's not another Simon Cowell , and, against Howard Stern 's wishes, you won't regularly find him critiquing contestant's physical appearances. You can't prejudice a situation like that, he told Howard Stern . "To a certain extent you can say "You don't look like a star, you don"t walk, talk and act like a star so get out of there."
